note:
did they get you to trade
your heros for ghosts
hot ashes for trees
hot air for a cool breeze
cold comfort for change?
did you exchange
a walk-on part in the war
for a lead role in the cage?

-- -- --
Heretic, Friend, Father, Teacher, Historian, Journalist, Husband, Mountain-man, Iconoclast, Student, Marxist, Environmentalist, Traitor, Gastronome, Critic, Doodler, Petit-Bourgeois, Procrastinator, Feminist, Photographer, Revolutionary, Pen-pusher...

-- -- --
Shimla, Delhi, Hyderabad
